content: here s another vintage bow knot scarf miss marple style this version has more of a shawl collar for extra comfort dk/sport weight version plus guide to customisation for simple changes to knitting it in entirely different yarn weights you will need approximately 220 yards of dk or sport weight yarn- i recoommend a woolly fiber or blend that feels comfortable on your skin larger needles- 3 75mm smaller needles- 3mm a stitch holder/double pointed needle gauge is not critical but scarf should measure 27 5in in length and 6 5in at the widest point if made at stated gauge of 6 5 row per inch 11 row per inch this is entirely customisable
